title: New Championship Leader!
content: After the last 2 rounds of the annual HRC Grand Prix League we have some movement at the top of the Championship Table.  With the top 3 men and ladies picking up silverware at the end of the season its vital to be in them all importaint top 3 positions!  Jamie Randall now leads the mens league with Paul Brough on his tail and in-form Josh Iron taking up the 3rd and final spot.  In the ladies Table, Teresa Franklin tops the league with Joan Nevin 2nd and Kirsty Millard 3rd.  Cheryl Trundle scored the highest overall score from any race as she hit a massive 82:32 with her impressive 40 Minute Time at the Sudbury 5.  This championship table is starting to get interesting
contentWithMarkup:
After the last 2 rounds of the annual HRC Grand Prix League we have some movement at the top of the Championship Table.

With the top 3 men and ladies picking up silverware at the end of the season its vital to be in them all importaint top 3 positions!

Jamie Randall now leads the mens league with Paul Brough on his tail and in-form Josh Iron taking up the 3rd and final spot.

In the ladies Table, Teresa Franklin tops the league with Joan Nevin 2nd and Kirsty Millard 3rd.

Cheryl Trundle scored the highest overall score from any race as she hit a massive 82:32 with her impressive 40 Minute Time at the Sudbury 5.

This championship table is starting to get interesting
